  1. net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn

Uses of Package
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn

Packages that use net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn
Package
Description
net.tvburger.jdl.adaline
Provides the implementation of Bernard Widrow and Ted Hoff's ADALINE (1960)
net.tvburger.jdl.mlp
Implementation of the MultiLayer Perceptron [WIP]
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn
Defines the neural network as specialization of an estimation function
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.initializers
Defines the neural network initialization algorithms
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.optimizers
Contains the neural network optimizer algorithms
net.tvburger.jdl.perceptron
Provides the implementation of Frank Rosenblatt's Perceptron (1958)
  • Classes in net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn used by net.tvburger.jdl.adaline
    Class
    Description
    DefaultNeuralNetwork
    Provides a standard implementation for a neural network.
    NeuralNetwork
    Represents a neural network as a specific kind of EstimationFunction.
    Neuron
    Represents a single artificial neuron in a neural network.
    NeuronVisitor
    A visitor interface for traversing a NeuralNetwork.
